Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in San Bartolome de Tirajana (Playa del Ingles), IFA Continental Hotel is minutes from Las Burras Beach and Playa de San Agustin. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Kasbah Shopping Center and Yumbo Shopping Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 383 guestrooms. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and sofa beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including a nightclub, an outdoor pool, and a sauna. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), an arcade/game room, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of IFA Continental Hotel, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in San Bartolome de Tirajana? This hotel has facilities measuring 420 square feet (39 square meters), including a meeting room. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of IFA Continental Hotel, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Las Burras Beach - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Playa de San Agustin - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Kasbah Shopping Center - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Yumbo Shopping Center - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
CITA Shopping Center - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Maspalomas Beach - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Holiday World Maspalomas - 3.2 km / 2 mi
El Aguila Beach - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Maspalomas Golf Course - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Maspalomas Dunes - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Aqualand Maspalomas - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Maspalomas Lighthouse - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Meloneras Beach - 5.4 km / 3.3 mi
Palmitos Park - 9.6 km / 6 mi
Puerto Rico Shopping Center - 14.8 km / 9.2 mi

The preferred airport for IFA Continental Hotel is Las Palmas (LPA-Gran Canaria) - 25.5 km / 15.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for IFA Continental Hotel is Las Palmas (LPA-Gran Canaria) - 25.4 km / 15.8 mi.
